WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thank you for the suggestion.  We will consider implementing this feature in a future release.
WorkItem.Description:
Dear,
 
This topic is about the absence in the datagrid of vertical scroll when focusing the cells in a bottom-up fashion. It is not a bug but a possible item for future improvement. A user often "overshoots" in item selection on the way down then wants to regress back up, which presently is only partially possible: one remains stuck on the first visible row.
 
The zip file contains all the material.
 
Thank you,
 
Julie

Comments.Message:
Julie,
Thanks for reporting this. We will add this to our customer scenario database. 

Thanks.
